job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Company DescriptionAt Revalize, we build the software and technology that powers sales of manufactured, complex products. Our customers rely on our software to select and sell everything from commercial ovens, to specialized pumps and valves, to grain elevators, and more. We are the global leader in sector-specific software solutions that help manufacturers optimize revenue operations through design applications, engineering simulations, product selection, CPQ, PIM, visualization, and data analytics.Headquartered in Jacksonville, FL, we serve over 8,000 customers across the globe.Revalize is a portfolio company of TA Associates.Job DescriptionAre you an experienced software developer who is looking for a new opportunity with a stable, growing company? Would you love an opportunity to work as part of a collaborative team who values excellent customer service and a strong work ethic? This innovative software company is looking for a Programmer who will develop and maintain applications by evaluating clientâs needs. This is a full-time position with excellent benefits located in Jacksonville, Florida.Responsibilitiesâ¢ Identify and analyze technical requirementsâ¢ Assist in establishing design standards, design patterns and best practices and follow themâ¢ Develop and maintain high quality applicationsâ¢ Create and maintain unit tests in order to ensure quality of codeâ¢ Answer questions for our Customer Support and Product Management teamsQualificationsRequired skills and abilitiesâ¢ 4+ years of experience with Javaâ¢ 2+ year(s) of experience with APIsâ¢ 1+ year(s) of experience with SpringÂ Desired skills that would make you an outstanding candidate:â¢ Mechanical Engineering backgroundâ¢ Experience with ERP and/or CRM integrationsâ¢ Experience with Angular or Reactâ¢ Experience with SQL Server or PostgeSQLÂ Educationâ¢ Bachelorâs Degree in Computer Science or equivalentAdditional InformationAll your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines. If qualified, to complete your application you will be required to complete a behavioral and aptitude test to be sent out via email.
